page.title: 10An Adult Spare Time Survey.
page.content: 36 adults were interviewed, 11 men and 25 women. 14 did sport. Swimming was the most popular sport. 34 read; 10 read newspapers, 6 read magazines, 18 read books. The most popular newspaper was The Sun,the most popular magazine was Womans Own,and favourite books were novels and history. 24 did gardening;15 grew flowers,2 grew vegetables,3 grew both,1 grew fruit,3 grew anything. Only 2 go to bingo;they go to Coral and the Community Centre. 17 went to discos. The most popular tv programmes are soap operas. 20 went to the pub. 28 cooked; cakes were the most popular food. 16 went to the theatre or cinema,9 to the theatre,7 to the cinema. Comedy was the most popular form of entertainment. 27 liked walking. 3 liked jogging. 21 wrote letters and enjoyed doing other things as well.
